plot: Two-Face and Joker have taken control of Arkham Asylum and captured the Batman. Now they must decide who is going to kill the Batman.
title: Batman: Two Face's Revenge
plot_es: Two-Face and Joker have taken control of Arkham Asylum and captured the Batman. Now they must decide who is going to kill the Batman.
plot_en: Two-Face and Joker have taken control of Arkham Asylum and captured the Batman. Now they must decide who is going to kill the Batman.
